General.Name: Hongda Xingye Co Ltd
General.Description: Hongda Xingye Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical products in China and internationally. It offers PVC construction boards and eco-houses, prefabricated homes, PVC sheets and films, and PVC-based wood-plastics composites; pharmaceutical packaging materials, including rigid PVC sheets, high barrier rigid compound sheets based on PVC, PVDC and PE, rigid PVC/PE compound sheets, rigid cold-formed aluminum sheets, and PTP aluminum foils; landscaping materials; and interior and exterior decoration materials comprising interior decorative plates, exterior hanging boards, interior floor, hanging decorations, faux stone wall, cabinets, and other products. The company also provides environmental modification engineering services, such as soil remediation, desulfuration, and denitration services; rare earth new materials, such as rare earth heat stabilizers and catalysts; and electronic spot trading, logistics and warehousing, procurement, and e-commerce services. In addition, it provides soil conditioner and desulfurizer products. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Golden Material Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hongda Xingye Co., Ltd. in June 2013. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
